sentences.en: I didn't even like show my outfit, I was in too much of a rush.
sentences.zh: 我刚刚其实都没来得及给你们看我的穿搭，太匆忙了。
sentences.phonetic_us: /aɪ ˈdɪdənt ˈivɪn laɪk ʃoʊ maɪ ˈaʊtˌfɪt, aɪ wəz ɪn tu mʌʧ əv ə rʌʃ/

highlight_entries.display_text: in too much of a rush

sentences.en: But we just did a caffeine pastry crawl around the city with Sister Snacking.
sentences.zh: 不过我们刚和 Sister Snacking 一起在市区里打卡了咖啡味甜品。
sentences.phonetic_us: /bʌt wi ʤʌst dɪd ə ˈkæfin ˈpeɪstri krɔl əˈraʊnd ðə ˈsɪti wɪð ˈsɪstər ˈsnækɪŋ/

sentences.en: Go follow them on Instagram if you don't already, they have the best recs.
sentences.zh: 如果你们还没关注他们的 Instagram，快去关注吧，他们的推荐的都很棒。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɡoʊ ˈfɑloʊ ðɛm ɑn ˈɪnstəˌɡræm ɪf ju doʊnt ɔlˈrɛdi, ðeɪ hæv ðə bɛst rɛks/

sentences.en: And we did a video with them, which was so fun.
sentences.zh: 我们还和他们拍了视频，特别有趣！
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd wi dɪd ə ˈvɪdioʊ wɪð ðɛm, wɪʧ wəz soʊ fʌn/

sentences.en: I immediately came home and showered, and got into comfy clothes.
sentences.zh: 回家之后我立马冲了个澡，换上舒服的衣服。
sentences.phonetic_us: /aɪ ɪˈmidiətli keɪm hoʊm ænd ˈʃaʊərd, ænd ɡɑt ˈɪntu ˈkʌmfi kloʊðz/

sentences.en: I love going home these days.
sentences.zh: 最近我真的很喜欢回家。

sentences.en: I'm like, I'm excited to go home.
sentences.zh: 每次都很期待快点回家。
sentences.phonetic_us: /aɪm laɪk, aɪm ɪkˈsaɪtɪd tə ɡoʊ hoʊm/

sentences.en: Like it was just, we finished reporting the podcast after that, and then it was rainy and cold, and I was like, get me home, get me cozy.
sentences.zh: 就像我们录完了播客后，外面又下雨又冷，我就想赶紧回家、窝在家里。
sentences.phonetic_us: /laɪk ɪt wəz ʤʌst, wi ˈfɪnɪʃt rɪˈpɔrtɪŋ ðə ˈpɑdˌkæst ˈæftər ðæt, ænd ðɛn ɪt wəz ˈreɪni ænd koʊld, ænd aɪ wəz laɪk, ɡɛt mi hoʊm, ɡɛt mi ˈkoʊzi/

sentences.en: But it was so fun, and it was actually kind of a vibe with the moody weather, drinking coffee.
sentences.zh: 不过今天真的很好玩，而且这种阴晴不定的天气，边喝咖啡边逛，反而很有氛围感。
sentences.phonetic_us: /bʌt ɪt wəz soʊ fʌn, ænd ɪt wəz ˈækʧuəli kaɪnd əv ə vaɪb wɪð ðə ˈmudi ˈwɛðər, ˈdrɪŋkɪŋ ˈkɑfi/
